name: Nuvola
headline: 10x power coin batteries for reliable connectivity on IoT trackers
description:
Millibatt makes high power rechargeable coin batteries for fast growing products such as trackers, earbuds, and health monitors. Millibatt’s coin battery is safe, provides reliable wireless connectivity with high power capabilities and is easily integrated into device assembly.

Millibatt helps hardware product designers choose best battery for their design by providing wide range of custom batteries with minimum order quantity as low as 10 batteries in less than 6 weeks. With Millibatt’s fast turnaround custom batteries, product designers can quickly iterate multiple designs for the best product outcome.

#  We've Eliminated The Primary Cause of Battery Fires
[ Here's How ](http://www.millibatt.com/<#safecoat>)
##  Troublesome Plastic Film Separator  Material is Now History
**Nuvola Technology** is a new battery material product company emerging from stealth mode development. The company has developed a groundbreaking battery separator technology, enabling EV and other high-energy battery manufacturers to build much safer and more profitable products.
##  Introducing SafeCoat™ DDS (Direct Deposition Separator) 
![Battery diagram showing anode and cathode with SafeCoat DDS](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Homepage_1.png)
  * ![cropped-Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square.png](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/cropped-Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square.png)
Eliminates film separator manufacturing defects – the cause of battery thermal runaway
  * ![Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square.png)
Increased active battery material volume improves energy density up to 20%
  * ![Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square.png)
Replaces the manufacturing rate-limiting film separator folding with a high-speed, scalable coating process


  * ![Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square.png)
Enables a major manufacturing yield improvement via in-line inspection
  * ![Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square.png)
Excellent performance – exceeds premium-grade plastic film separator material
  * ![Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square.png)
Highly cost-competitive with traditional film material


![SaeCoat DDS Delivery system diagram showing electrode encapsulated with Safecoat DDS](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Homepage_2.png)
[ Learn More about SafeCoat DDS ](http://www.millibatt.com/<https:/nuvola.tech/safecoat-dds/>)
##  Nimbus™ ZEA (Z-Fold Electrode Architecture) Making Small Batteries Last Up to 16x Longer in Wireless Applications
![Homepage_3](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Homepage_3.jpg)
  * ![Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square.png)
Replaces today's small coin cell battery volume-hungry coiled electrodes with a new Z-Fold structure – improving battery life for rechargeable wireless applications such as TWS by up to 50%.
  * ![Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square.png)
A perfect electrode technology for TWS, hearing devices, and small wireless IoT sensors – where long battery life really counts


  * ![Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square.png)
A game-changing high surface area electrode structure that delivers the immediate high power draw required by Bluetooth-intensive apps – a dramatic improvement in time between recharging
  * ![Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square](https://nuvola.tech/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Nuvola_Symbol_Trasparent-square.png)
Suitable for a wide range of coin cell formats and shapes as thin as 1 mm

**Nuvola: Powering the Future of IoT with Innovative Battery Technology**

Founded in 2015 and hailing from the vibrant technology hub of Los Angeles, Nuvola, initially known as Millibatt, is on a mission to transform the battery landscape—specifically for IoT devices. Their focus? Developing 10x power coin batteries that ensure reliable connectivity for a myriad of applications, from trackers and earbuds to health monitors. 

### A New Approach to Coin Batteries

Nuvola offers a compelling solution for hardware designers: custom high-power rechargeable coin batteries tailored to meet specific design needs. With an impressively low minimum order quantity of just 10 units, Nuvola allows designers to experiment and iterate rapidly, ensuring they find the ideal power compatibility for their products. This adaptability is crucial in a fast-paced market where speed can be the difference between success and mediocrity.

### Innovations: SafeCoat™ and Nimbus™ Technologies

At the heart of Nuvola's approach are two innovative technologies:
1. **SafeCoat™ DDS (Direct Deposition Separator)**: This groundbreaking battery separator eliminates common manufacturing defects that lead to thermal runaway—a notorious cause of battery fires. SafeCoat not only enhances safety but also boosts energy density by up to 20%, all while being cost-competitive with traditional materials.

2. **Nimbus™ ZEA (Z-Fold Electrode Architecture)**: Designed to significantly extend battery life, particularly for small wireless applications, Nimbus replaces conventional coiled electrodes with a compact Z-Fold structure. This advancement allows batteries to last up to 16 times longer, a remarkable achievement for devices like True Wireless Stereo (TWS) earbuds and sophisticated health tracking sensors.

### Lean Team, Big Aspirations

With a nimble team of four employees and backing from Y Combinator's W17 batch, Nuvola is poised to disrupt the alternative battery sector. Their partnership with Nan enhances their strategic capabilities, positioning them well within a competitive industry landscape marked by a strong push for sustainable energy solutions.

### Conclusion

In a world increasingly dependent on connectivity, Nuvola is not just creating batteries; they’re establishing the backbone for a range of essential technologies. Their commitment to safety, performance, and customization resonates deeply in a market clamoring for innovation. As IoT devices proliferate, companies like Nuvola will be at the forefront, ensuring that these devices power our connected lives reliably and efficiently.

For more information on their offerings and how you can leverage their innovative technology, visit [Millibatt](http://www.millibatt.com).
